experience.details.cra.title: Canada Revenue Agency
experience.details.cra.header.about.desc: involves developing, testing, and maintaining IT applications while proactively identifying and resolving issues to ensure seamless performance and reliability.
experience.details.cra.body.about.brief: I manage multiple applications in both production and development, some of which adopt new technologies and frameworks, requiring me to develop updated versions. My role covers the full development cycle, from frontend and backend development to analyzing business requirements and documenting processes.
Develop, test, and maintain IT applications
Create clear and concise technical documentation
Analyze and translate client requirements into actionable development plans
Handling the entire process from design and coding
to implementation for fully functional web applications.

I have gained extensive experience in full-stack web development, working on both frontend and backend across various projects. My work ranges from simple applications like form submissions to complex systems involving secure session management and file-based CRUD operations. These experiences have sharpened my ability to create efficient, scalable, and secure web applications that meet diverse business requirements.
experience.details.cra.frontend.descript: Building responsive, interactive, and user-friendly web applications with modern technologies
experience.details.cra.frontend.key.resp: Ensure a seamless and consistent user experience across various screen sizes and devices.
experience.details.cra.frontend.key.inte: Implement multilingual support to enhance accessibility and user experience across different regions.
experience.details.cra.frontend.key.arch: Build scalable and maintainable UIs using reusable and modular components.
experience.details.cra.frontend.key.inte: Efficiently manage application state and seamlessly connect with backend services for real-time data updates.
experience.details.cra.library.key.compo: Developed modular and reusable UI components used across multiple Angular applications, significantly improving consistency and maintainability.
experience.details.cra.library.key.impro: Streamlined frontend workflows by enabling rapid integration of pre-built components, reducing development time by up to six times.
experience.details.cra.library.key.acces: Ensured all components comply with WCAG 2.1 standards, delivering inclusive user experiences for people of all abilities.
experience.details.cra.library.key.secur: Implemented secure coding practices in component design to protect applications from common vulnerabilities.
experience.details.cra.backend.descripti: Designing and implementing scalable, secure, and maintainable backend systems using Java and related technologies to ensure reliable business logic and smooth data operations.
experience.details.cra.api.title: API Design & Integration
experience.details.cra.api.description: Designed and developed RESTful APIs to enable efficient communication between frontend applications and backend services, ensuring seamless data exchange and performance.
experience.details.cra.message.title: Message Queue Integration
experience.details.cra.message.descripti: Integrated asynchronous messaging to enable reliable communication between services, enhancing scalability and reducing system coupling.
experience.details.cra.auth.title: Auth & Security
experience.details.cra.auth.description: Implemented secure user authentication, role-based access control, and endpoint validation to protect sensitive data and enforce proper access controls across the application.
experience.details.cra.error.title: Error Handling & Logging
experience.details.cra.error.description: Implemented structured error handling and comprehensive logging strategies to improve system observability, maintainability, and simplify debugging.
experience.details.cra.file.title: File System CRUD Operations
experience.details.cra.file.description: Built backend features to handle file uploads, downloads, updates, and deletions, managing file storage securely and efficiently within the application.
Ensuring long-term stability, performance, and support
for both in-development and production applications

I actively maintain and support multiple applications throughout their lifecycle—from development to production. This includes updating and refactoring shared libraries, fixing production issues, and responding to client feedback. I work closely with teams to ensure smooth deployments, monitor application health, and apply best practices to keep systems running reliably and securely.
experience.details.cra.maintenance.key.d: Ensuring long-term stability, performance, and support for both in-development and production applications.
experience.details.cra.maintenance.key.s: Resolved real-time issues in production environments to minimize downtime and maintain a smooth user experience.
experience.details.cra.maintenance.key.u: Maintained and improved core libraries used across applications, ensuring consistency, performance, and long-term maintainability.
experience.details.cra.maintenance.key.b: Reduced technical debt by identifying bugs and refactoring code across multiple applications to enhance code quality and reliability.
experience.details.cra.maintenance.key.m: Monitored application health and optimized performance to ensure systems run efficiently under real-world usage.
experience.details.cra.maintenance.key.c: Coordinated with teams and delivered clear documentation to support smooth collaboration and ongoing system maintenance.
experience.details.kp.title: Project KP
experience.details.kp.header.about.descr: a paid freelance project delivering a custom automation solution tailored to the client’s high-demand workflows
experience.details.kp.body.about.brief: I was referred to this opportunity by a close friend who personally knew the client. The client sought an exclusive, reliable product that could automate a wide range of repetitive tasks — running 24/7 to fully replace manual human input. The goal was to build a single bot capable of handling up to 15 different project workflows over the course of a 6-month contract.
experience.details.kp.body.about.brief.l: Designed to automate all repetitive workflows, eliminating the need for any manual involvement from the client
Clients had previously encountered unreliable third-party tools — including scams, unstable software, and incidents of stolen data — so reliability and trust were essential
The bot was required to manage up to 15 separate projects, each with unique logic and operational flow, all within a single unified system
The solution needed to run continuously (24/7), managing task scheduling, error handling, and self-recovery to maintain uptime
Since the bot performed crucial daily operations, any bugs or interruptions had to be addressed and resolved immediately to avoid disruption in the client’s workflow
experience.details.kp.v1.description: A custom-built software designed to automate all repetitive tasks, minimizing — and often eliminating — the need for human intervention. This solution was developed with reliability, flexibility, and long-term usability in mind, supporting multiple workflows with minimal supervision required.
experience.details.kp.v1.key.automate.de: Fully automated various workflows from start to finish, handling repetitive operations that previously required manual input.
experience.details.kp.v1.key.realtime.de: Included monitoring mechanisms to detect failures and trigger automatic recovery steps — with fallback to manual alerts if necessary.
experience.details.kp.v1.key.multi.title: Multi-Project Workflow Management
experience.details.kp.v1.key.multi.descr: Successfully runs 12 distinct project tasks continuously, each with unique logic and schedules, using multiple preset accounts — all within a single unified system.
experience.details.kp.v1.key.architectur: Built with adaptability at its core, enabling seamless updates to logic, schedules, and account configurations without changing the core codebase — laying a strong foundation for the more advanced second version currently in development.
experience.details.kp.v1.tech.title: Technology Stack (Ver. 1)
experience.details.kp.v1.tech.descriptio:
The first version of the solution was a backend-only system built primarily with Python. It ran as a standalone script-based service, leveraging various libraries to automate complex workflows — including AI-powered features for decision-making and task handling.

Although the client did not require a user interface and prioritized performance, a lightweight UI was added to neatly organize settings and controls, making the system easier to manage.
experience.details.kp.v1.tech.key.ai: Integrated AI capabilities for smart task execution
experience.details.kp.v1.tech.key.ui: Lightweight optional UI for simplified client-side control
experience.details.kp.v1.tech.key.perfor: Focused on performance, reliability, and low resource usage
experience.details.kp.v2.feature.title: KP ver. 2 (in development)
experience.details.kp.v2.feature.ui.desc: Includes a custom-built desktop UI using React for configuring the bot, monitoring stats, reviewing data, and managing advanced controls — all in a user-friendly environment
experience.details.kp.v2.feature.profile: Supports concurrent task execution across multiple profiles using multi-threading, maximizing process efficiency and boosting overall throughput compared to version 1.
experience.details.kp.v2.feature.schedul: Automates task start times by leveraging multiple APIs and dynamic logic to optimize intervals, reducing manual triggers and ensuring efficient use of system resources.
experience.details.kp.v2.feature.log.des: Built-in real-time logs, visual indicators, and status reporting help users monitor operations, detect issues instantly, and ensure smooth 24/7 performance.
experience.details.personal.title: Related Experience
experience.details.personal.position: A mix of personal projects, academic background, and skills that shaped my journey into software development and continue to support my growth in the field.
experience.details.personal.education.de: My technical journey began with software, but my foundation actually started in hardware and automation
experience.details.personal.education.ac: Gained hands-on experience with core programming concepts, modern development practices, and full stack applications. This program helped solidify my skills in Java and backend development, setting the stage for my career in software engineering.
Built dynamic websites using both frontend and backend technologies, focusing on functionality, responsive UI/UX, and robust server-side logic including database integration and API development.
Developed Android applications using Java, focusing on full app functionality, UI design, navigation, and integration with backend services for a complete user experience.

Learned how to design and implement robust backend systems with a strong focus on data handling, server-side logic, and database management—emphasizing clean architecture, reusable patterns, and maintainable code structure.
Designed and implemented APIs for communication between services, learning how to handle HTTP requests, data exchange formats, and security best practices.
experience.details.personal.education.tr: My technical journey may have grown through software, but its roots are firmly planted in hardware and automation.
This foundation continues to shape the way I approach problem-solving, system design, and innovation across both physical and digital domains.
experience.details.personal.education.uo:
HCMC University of Technology
Bachelor of Electrical and Electronic Engineering

Major: Automation
Minor: Electronics & Electricity
(2014-2017)

Focused on the inner workings of machines and embedded systems. While the program leaned more toward industrial automation and electronics, it shaped the way I think about problem-solving, systems design, and control logic—knowledge I continue to apply in software and automation projects today.
Learned industrial automation systems and logic controls (PLCs, sensors, actuators), which built the foundation for my interest in software automation.
Gained practical skills in analog/digital circuit design, microcontroller programming, and embedded systems development.
Explored the fundamentals of physical computing—building, testing, and troubleshooting real-world electrical devices and systems.
Studied fundamental networking concepts including communication protocols, signal transmission, and data flow—gaining a solid understanding of how systems exchange information over various media.
Designed and simulated control models for real-world automation challenges, from traffic lights to manufacturing machines.
experience.details.personal.soft.title: Soft skills
experience.details.personal.soft.solving: Able to break down complex problems, analyze them logically, and develop practical solutions with long-term impact.
experience.details.personal.soft.contrib: Comfortable collaborating in teams or taking full ownership of tasks—adapting to project needs with flexibility.
experience.details.personal.soft.time.de: Skilled at balancing multiple tasks and priorities while maintaining high attention to detail and meeting deadlines.
experience.details.personal.soft.adapt.d: Quick to pick up new technologies, frameworks, or workflows—driven to grow and stay up to date in dynamic environments.

experience.to.other.exp.web.description: If your needs aren’t met here, I invite you to browse my other projects or review my skills section. My expertise spans multiple disciplines—there’s more to discover beyond web development!

skills.page.title: Detailed Skills
skills.page.opening.transition.alert.con: My technical skills are closely aligned with the areas I've worked in, especially across backend, frontend, and automation projects.
That said, my learning never stops—I’m always expanding my knowledge base and staying up to date with the latest technologies and best practices.
skills.page.frontend.transition.alert.co: With a strong backend foundation, I also excel in frontend development, delivering complete, end-to-end solutions.
I enjoy transforming logic and data into intuitive user experiences and working with both custom UIs and component-driven frameworks.
skills.page.tools.transition.alert.conte: Beyond coding skills, the tools I use play a vital role in how I work—helping me stay efficient, focused, and effective throughout the development lifecycle.
skills.backend.title: Backend
skills.backend.description: I’m confident working across several backend languages and frameworks, using them to build reliable, secure, and scalable server-side systems.
skills.backend.java.content:
Experienced in designing and developing complete backend systems using Java and Spring Boot. My capabilities include:

  • Building RESTful APIs that enable frontend-backend communication
  • Integrating with relational databases using JPA/Hibernate
  • Securing applications with user authentication, role-based authorization, and OAuth2
  • Validating input and enforcing business rules
  • Implementing layered architecture (Controller, Service, Repository)
  • Scheduling background tasks and handling file processing
  • Working with messaging queues and asynchronous processes when needed
  • Writing unit and integration tests to ensure code quality
skills.backend.python.content:
Used Python extensively for building backend scripts, tools, and automation systems. Key strengths include:

  • Data manipulation, processing, and transformation (CSV, JSON, XML, etc.)
  • Automating workflows and interacting with file systems, browsers, apps, system scripts or external APIs
  • Using and develop AI-powered tools and integrate intelligent logic into applications.
  • Writing software tools and bots with robust, modular codebases
  • Capable of using frameworks like Django for lightweight web backends
  • Building CLI tools or scheduled backend services for long-running tasks
skills.backend.js.content:
I’ve applied JavaScript and TypeScript extensively in backend development, particularly within full-stack environments. Key experience includes:

  • Building scalable backend services using Node.js and modern frameworks
  • Designing and consuming RESTful and GraphQL APIs for efficient data exchange
  • Writing modular, maintainable code with a strong focus on type safety
  • Managing asynchronous workflows, real-time updates, and background tasks
  • Integrating with third-party services, databases, and cloud APIs
skills.frontend.title: Frontend
skills.frontend.description: I specialize in crafting modern, user-friendly interfaces using powerful frontend technologies. My work includes building scalable, responsive, and maintainable UI components, integrating APIs, and ensuring performance optimization.
skills.frontend.angular.content:
It offers robust tools for managing complex frontend architectures and creating dynamic, reusable components. Key experience includes:

  • Built enterprise-level applications with component-based architecture and modular design
  • Used RxJS for reactive programming and efficient state management
  • Created dynamic forms using both template-driven and reactive approaches
  • Implemented internationalization using @ngx-translate
  • Wrote unit and integration tests using Jest and Karma
skills.frontend.react.content:
React allows me to build interactive UIs quickly with its declarative syntax and component-based approach. My experience with React includes:

  • Built fully functional, responsive interfaces using functional components and hooks
  • Managed state with built-in hooks and external libraries
  • Integrated APIs and asynchronous logic with useEffect and custom hooks
  • Wrote comprehensive test cases using React Testing Library
skills.frontend.ts.content:
With TypeScript, I ensure type safety and better maintainability in all projects. I leverage JavaScript’s features to create clean, efficient logic. Key experience includes:

  • Wrote scalable, type-safe frontend logic with TypeScript
  • Used ES6+ features to write clean, modular, and maintainable code
  • Created utility functions and shared logic across apps
skills.frontend.markup.content:
Building semantic, accessible web pages with HTML and styling them with CSS is fundamental to creating a great user experience. My skills include:

  • Crafted semantic, accessible HTML for all components and layouts
  • Designed responsive UIs using CSS Grid, Flexbox, and media queries
  • Ensured accessibility compliance following WCAG guidelines
skills.frontend.tailwind.content:
Tailwind CSS enables rapid and consistent UI development with utility-first classes. I use Tailwind to speed up development and maintain design consistency. Key experience includes:

  • Rapidly styled interfaces with utility-first classes
  • Built consistent design systems and responsive layouts
  • Customized design tokens and themes for brand-specific styling
skills.tools.title: Tools & Productivity
skills.tools.description: Alongside programming, I rely on a set of essential tools that enhance my workflow—from development and testing to collaboration and deployment. These tools help me stay productive, streamline development cycles, and ensure high-quality delivery across projects.

skills.tools.ai.name: ChatGPT
skills.tools.ai.content:

  • Assist in verifying debugging logic, exploring edge cases, and validating design decisions
  • Help identify potential flaws in implementation ideas before coding
  • Useful for quick syntax recall, API reference, and code pattern suggestions
  • Support continuous learning by providing explanations, clarifications, and best practices across technologies
